directions: Warm the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in the garlic, celery, and green onions. Cook, stirring frequently, until tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in beans, tomatoes, cream of mushroom soup, and water. Bring to a boil. Stir in dill, reduce heat to medium, and simmer 10 minutes. Stir in shrimp, and simmer until shrimp are pink, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained
1 (10 ounce) can tomatoes with green chilies
1 (10 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
12 ounces medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
title: Spicy Shrimp and Red Bean Soup
